findings.matched_text:
# canary-deployment-istio.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-v1
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
      version: ...

# canary-monitoring.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: canary-analysis
  namespace: production
data:
  analyze.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash
    set -euo pipefail

    CANARY_DEPLOYMENT="${...
